title: Implement Plan Phase - Decomposition + Ship It
description: Wire up the Plan phase: AI-assisted feature decomposition from PRD, Plan markdown generation, beads epic/gate task creation, dependency graph visualization, Ship It! button that closes gate tasks. See PRD Section 7.2.
close_reason: Implemented Plan Phase: AI decomposition, Plan markdown, beads epic/gate, dependency graph visualization, Ship It! and Re-ship buttons

title: Fix undefined crash in TaskService.extractEpicId when viewing live agent output
description: When subscribing to live agent output for a task in the Build phase (e.g. opensprint.dev-dlp), the server throws: . The error occurs in TaskService.extractEpicId at line 102, which is called from beadsIssueToTask when converting a beads issue to a Task. The root cause is that  can be undefined when passed to extractEpicId, but the function calls  without a null/undefined check. Add a guard in extractEpicId to handle undefined/null id (e.g. return null early), and optionally add defensive handling in beadsIssueToTask when issue.id is missing.

title: Implement login endpoint
close_reason: Implemented login endpoint: POST /api/v1/auth/login with JWT, bcrypt validation, auth config at ~/.opensprint/auth.json

title: User should be able to drag to change the percent width of the screen that's allocated to chat vs the PRD in the design tab
close_reason: Implemented drag-to-resize split between chat and PRD panes in Design tab

title: Show connection status only when offline
description: Change the top-right connection indicator so it is hidden when the server is online and websockets are connected. Only show it when the server is offline or websockets are disconnected, displaying a red dot and the text "offline" instead of the current green dot and "online".

title: Agent context assembly
description: Build the context assembly pipeline: gather relevant PRD sections, Plan markdown, and upstream task diffs/summaries into the .opensprint/active/<task-id>/ directory structure. See PRD Section 12.2.
close_reason: Implemented context assembly pipeline per PRD §12.2: gather PRD sections, Plan markdown, upstream task diffs/summaries into .opensprint/active/<task-id>/. Added Acceptance Criteria and Technical Approach to prompts per §12.3. Unit tests added.

title: Make validate screen content scrollable when feedback exceeds viewport
description: The validate screen currently prevents scrolling when feedback content is longer than the viewport, so users cannot see all feedback. The page contents should be scrollable so users can scroll down to view the full feedback regardless of length.

title: Add Cmd/Ctrl+Enter keyboard shortcut to submit feedback form
description: When the user is in the feedback submission form, pressing Cmd+Enter (Mac) or Ctrl+Enter (Windows/Linux) should submit the feedback. This matches common UX patterns for text areas and forms and improves accessibility for power users.

title: Pre-hydrate build page with tasks state to prevent loading flash
description: When the build page loads, it should be pre-hydrated with the current tasks state (e.g., via an initial API fetch or server-rendered data) rather than waiting for the first websocket payload. This avoids a flash of empty or loading content before tasks appear.

title: Link Validate feedback issue IDs to Build tab
description: On the Validate screen, each piece of feedback shows an issue ID. These IDs should be clickable links that navigate directly to the corresponding issue on the Build tab, so users can quickly jump from feedback to the related build item.

title: Implement Validate Phase - Feedback mapping
description: Wire up the Validate phase: feedback submission, AI categorization (bug/feature/ux/scope), mapping to Plan epics, automatic ticket creation, PRD update proposals for scope changes. See PRD Section 7.4.
close_reason: Implemented Validate Phase feedback mapping: plan context for AI categorization, parent-child task creation under epic, feedback.mapped WebSocket subscription for live updates. PRD §7.4.

title: Active agents registry - show all running agents across Design, Plan, Build, Validate
description: Implement a unified view of all agents currently running across Design, Plan, Build, and Validate phases. Currently only Build orchestrator tracks agents; Design/Plan/Validate use fire-and-forget invoke() with no central registry. Epic covers: ActiveAgentsService, instrumentation of all phases, API endpoint, WebSocket events, and UI component.

title: Persist current phase in URL slug for shareable links
description: The user's current page (design, plan, build, validate) should be captured as part of the URL slug. This enables deep linking, bookmarking specific phases, sharing URLs to collaborators, and proper browser back/forward navigation. Marked as top priority.

title: Beads output transformation layer
description: Create a transformation layer that maps raw beads CLI JSON output (BeadsIssue) to full Task types with computed kanbanColumn, dependencies, epicId. This is needed before Build phase can work properly.
close_reason: Implemented transformation layer: BeadsIssue → Task mapping with kanbanColumn computation, field name normalization (issue_type→type, owner→assignee), epicId extraction from hierarchical IDs, and parallel bd ready fetching for ready vs backlog distinction.
